name: Pokemon Crystal Red
description:
When you reach the POKEMON LOGO screen PRESS START

This project is a prototype, all for learning purposes trying to replicate the POKEMON CRYSTAL intro on top of GB Studio engine.

CONTROLS GAME BOY KEYBOARD MOVE D-pad Arrow Keys INTERACTA Z EXITB X PRESS STARTSTART ENTER

It isn't perfect but slightly close to the real animation from the original game.

In addition to the animation the Pallet town from POKEMON RED was also replicated in a simple way just as an experiment as well.
